name: Broken Wings
description:
Entry for Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2019 - "Only One"

You fell from your nest atop the tree you call home.

On the way down, your wing lost it's lift.

Climb the tree level by level one jump at a time.

WASD - Move

R - Reset Level

Space - Jump, designated by wing status

Credits

Programming and Art - Ryan Sheeran

Game and Level Design - Brandon Sheeran

Music and Sounds - Michael Bukszar
